scheme_data.schemeName: Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB)
scheme_data.shortDescription: {"id": "jAKLHI0BsSMYTfzi8-BT", "fields": {"beneficiaryState": ["Arunachal Pradesh"], "schemeShortTitle": "APCHAPB&OCWWB", "level": "State", "nodalMinistryName": null, "schemeCategory": ["Social welfare & Empowerment"], "schemeName": "Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB)", "schemeCloseDate": null, "slug": "apchapbandocwwb", "briefDescription": "The scheme \u201cAdvance for Purchase or Construction of House\u201d was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).", "age": {"ews": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "sc": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "general": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "obc": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "st": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "female": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}, "widowed": {"gte": 18, "lte": 45}}, "tags": ["Construction Worker", "House", "Purchase", "Construction", "Financial Assistance"]}, "highlight": {}}
scheme_data.description:
The name of this welfare scheme is Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB). It is also known as APCHAPB&OCWWB. The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building &amp; Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB). The state government has formulated this scheme to implement through the APB&amp;OCWWB in which the board can sanction/ grant an amount for the outright purchase of a house or for the construction of a house to the eligible building and construction workers. The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual. It is specifically implemented in Arunachal Pradesh. The implementing agency is Registered Office, APB&OCWWB Of Respective District Of Arunachal Pradesh. Additionally, the nodal department is Labour and Employment Department.

The scheme provides the following benefits: Under this scheme, cash assistance of ₹00 lakh is to be given to the registered workers.

Eligibility criteria include: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.
The applicant must be employed in the Building and Other Construction works.
The applicant should be registered with Labour Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB).
The applicant should be an active registered worker with a membership for at least 5 years.
The applicant should have at least 15 years of service before superannuation/ retirement.
The applicant must be able to repay the principal amount of the loan with a minimum interest rate or with interest in equal installments as may be fixed by the board. The application process is as follows: Step 01: For taking benefit of this scheme, the applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&amp;OCWWB of the respective District.
Step 02: Application in the prescribed format may be received from the concerned office.
Step 03: The applicant needs to fill the application form completely and attach all the relevant documents. Thereafter, the applicant may submit the application form to the concerned office.
Step 04: After successful verification, the applicant can avail the benefit of the scheme. For more information, please refer to: Website: https://tawang.nic.in/labour-welfare-board/ Guideline: https://ahvdd.arunachal.gov.in/pdf/eBook/Government%20Scheme%20Handbook.pdf Tags associated with the scheme include: Construction, Construction Worker, Financial Assistance, House, Purchase.

scheme_data.combined_text:
The name of this welfare scheme is Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB). It is also known as APCHAPB&OCWWB. The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building &amp; Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB). The state government has formulated this scheme to implement through the APB&amp;OCWWB in which the board can sanction/ grant an amount for the outright purchase of a house or for the construction of a house to the eligible building and construction workers. The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual. It is specifically implemented in Arunachal Pradesh. The implementing agency is Registered Office, APB&OCWWB Of Respective District Of Arunachal Pradesh. Additionally, the nodal department is Labour and Employment Department.

The scheme provides the following benefits: Under this scheme, cash assistance of ₹00 lakh is to be given to the registered workers.

Eligibility criteria include: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.
The applicant must be employed in the Building and Other Construction works.
The applicant should be registered with Labour Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB).
The applicant should be an active registered worker with a membership for at least 5 years.
The applicant should have at least 15 years of service before superannuation/ retirement.
The applicant must be able to repay the principal amount of the loan with a minimum interest rate or with interest in equal installments as may be fixed by the board. The application process is as follows: Step 01: For taking benefit of this scheme, the applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&amp;OCWWB of the respective District.
Step 02: Application in the prescribed format may be received from the concerned office.
Step 03: The applicant needs to fill the application form completely and attach all the relevant documents. Thereafter, the applicant may submit the application form to the concerned office.
Step 04: After successful verification, the applicant can avail the benefit of the scheme. For more information, please refer to: Website: https://tawang.nic.in/labour-welfare-board/ Guideline: https://ahvdd.arunachal.gov.in/pdf/eBook/Government%20Scheme%20Handbook.pdf Tags associated with the scheme include: Construction, Construction Worker, Financial Assistance, House, Purchase.

sentences.sent: The name of this welfare scheme is Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB).
It is also known as APCHAPB&OCWWB.
The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt.
of Arunachal Pradesh for registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building &amp; Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB).

The state government has formulated this scheme to implement through the APB&amp;OCWWB in which the board can sanction/ grant an amount for the outright purchase of a house or for the construction of a house to the eligible building and construction workers.
The scheme targets beneficiaries such as Individual.
It is specifically implemented in Arunachal Pradesh.
The implementing agency is Registered Office, APB&OCWWB Of Respective District Of Arunachal Pradesh.
Additionally, the nodal department is Labour and Employment Department.
The scheme provides the following benefits: Under this scheme, cash assistance of ₹00 lakh is to be given to the registered workers.
Eligibility criteria include: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.
The applicant must be employed in the Building and Other Construction works.
The applicant should be registered with Labour Welfare Board (APB&amp;OCWWB).
The applicant should be an active registered worker with a membership for at least 5 years.
The applicant should have at least 15 years of service before superannuation/ retirement.
The applicant must be able to repay the principal amount of the loan with a minimum interest rate or with interest in equal installments as may be fixed by the board.
The application process is as follows: Step 01: For taking benefit of this scheme, the applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&amp;OCWWB of the respective District.
Step 02: Application in the prescribed format may be received from the concerned office.
Step 03: The applicant needs to fill the application form completely and attach all the relevant documents.
Thereafter, the applicant may submit the application form to the concerned office.
Step 04: After successful verification, the applicant can avail the benefit of the scheme.
For more information, please refer to: Website: https://tawang.
